title: [Placements] Emails getting delayed
content: I have been receiving my emails sent by the placement cell hours late. I have been facing the same issue for weeks. Anyone facing a similar problem? If yes, how did u resolve it?

comments.body: Most people are having the same issue; And sadly there is no solution for it
Thanks..ping me if u find any solution for it

I talked in the placement cell, he added my mail id seperately to the mail list, I received email for 2-3 days, then the problem started again; Now they are using placement app, so might not be a big issue in upcoming weeks
nah i believe they might be sending the mails late, usually around 11 at night
They are sending it early; Sometimes it happens like they send the email at morning 11 and some people receive it at 6 or 7 in the evening.
The main issue is the deadlines would have been passed by the time the mail is received
Yeah that's completely true; Sometimes, some mails are not delivered at all; They could have used some other platform like Google groups or google classroom, instead of Google mail list.

I suspect it's due to rate limiting from Google. They send the emails through Google groups. A solution is to go to groups.google.com and keep refreshing it to get updates. We can probably automate this polling and send a notification if a new message is sent there.
